improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error.  The variable 'x' will be 0 after the loop completes, leading to a runtime error. Add a check to ensure x is not 0 before division.
Unreachable code path. The if condition (x > 0) will always be false when x reaches 0 at the end of the loop. The code inside the if block will never be reached.
Performance improvement. The code calculates y = 0 multiple times in the loop. This can be simplified by setting y = 0 after the loop.
